TopicTitle: Why can't I click on my buildings?

Articles.Content:
I just started a new modded 1.0.5 LP when suddenly I couldn't select my buildings. Even when I click on the buildings, nothing. Plz halp.

Mod list (all 1.0.5)
RemoteTech2
KAS
KAC
KER
Community Resource Pack
MechJeb2
Module Manager
RealPlume
SmokeScreen
Sounding Rockets
SpaceY Heavy Lifters
TweakScale

I suspect it has something to do with a mod, but I'm not sure.

NVM, I guess I was just running my game for too long :D
I have no idea why the first restart didn't work, yet the second one did, but I'm not going to argue.

Requesting a mod to delete the thread now.
